content: To buy license, click the button below.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message encouraging users to purchase or buy a license. In UI, it appears as a button label and/or accompanying text on a payment or subscription page. The message aims to guide users toward activating their license purchase or renewal process.

usage.context:
<TariffTitleContainer />
 
 {isLicenseDateExpired ? <BenefitsContainer t={t} /> : null}
 <Text fontSize="14px" className="payments_renew-subscription">
 {isLicenseDateExpired
 ? t("ActivatePurchaseBuyLicense")
 : t("ActivatePurchaseRenewLicense")}
 </Text>
 <ButtonContainer t={t} />
 
 <div className="payments_support">

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'aşağıdakı düyməyə klikləyin' sounds a bit awkward. While technically correct, it's more natural to use a more idiomatic construction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lisenziyanı almaq üçün aşağıdakı düyməni vurun.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly an error, using 'vurun' instead of 'klikləyin' is more consistent with common Azerbaijani usage for buttons and interfaces.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change required, but consider 'vurun' for better consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Klicken Sie auf die Schaltfläche unten, wenn Sie eine Lizenz erwerben möchten' is a bit wordy and formal. A more natural translation would be closer to 'Click the button below to purchase a license.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Klicken Sie auf die Schaltfläche unten, um eine Lizenz zu kaufen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Լիցենզիա գնելու համար սեղմեք ստորև նշված կոճակը:" is a literal translation but sounds slightly awkward in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would be something like "Սեղմեք ստորև գնելու համար լիցենզիա" or "Գնելու համար լիցենզիա, սեղմեք ստորև գտնված կոճակը:" The current translation puts more emphasis on the button rather than the action.
While technically correct, 'por favor' (please) is often unnecessary and slightly formal in this context. It's better to keep the language more direct and concise for UI elements.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para comprar uma licença, clique no botão abaixo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ඔබන්න' in 'පහත බොත්තම ඔබන්න' is a less formal and slightly awkward way to say 'click'. A more natural and standard phrasing would be 'තියන්න'.
The Slovenian translation uses 'spodnji na gumb' which is grammatically incorrect. The correct preposition to use with 'gumb' is 'na'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Za nakup licence kliknite na spodnji gumb.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian word 'дугме' is often used for buttons, but 'дугме' is more colloquial. 'Тамбле' (tamblje) or 'дугме' is generally preferred in professional contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Да бисте купили лиценцу, кликните на тамбле испод.
